snippet: Some fans wonder whether the efforts of some college basketball referees are compromised by overwork. The referees and the major conferences say no.
lead_paragraph: Some fans wonder whether the efforts of some college basketball referees are compromised by overwork. The referees and the major conferences say no.

headline.seo: N.C.A.A. Referees’ Workloads Attract Comment and Scrutiny
headline.main: N.C.A.A. Referees’ Workloads Attract Comment and Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: A Heavy Workload May Be More a Sign of a Top Referee Than a Tired One
